name: Chicken Catch (Poletipo)
description:
GOAL:

The chickens have escaped! Your goal is to bring them all back to the pen where they can be safe again. Grab them and throw them chicken back in the pen!

Bring them together as quickly as possible and challenge your friends to beat your time!

CONTROLS:

Move : wasd / Left joystick

Grab : Right Click / Square Button

Drop : Right Click / Square Button 

Throw : Left Click/X Button

Restart : R

Stop Music : P ( Very useful )

Quit: Escape
